General.blackjack: Earn 21 postgame cards in quick or competitive play
General.centenary: Win 100 games in quick or competitive play.
General.decked_out: Collect 50 unlocks for a single hero.
General.decorated: Earn 50 postgame medals in quick or competitive play.
General.the_friend_zone: Play a quick or competitive play game in a group with a friend.
General.the_path_is_closed: Destroy 3 of Symmetra's Teleporters in a single quick or competitive game.
General.survival_expert: Use Health Packs to heal 900 health in a single life in quick or competitive play.
General.undying: Get a 20 player kill streak in a quick or competitive game.Reward: Tea Time Spray
